Your Sleep is Inadequate.Adequate sleep is essential for a healthy lifestyle. Jul 25 2019 - Sep 30 2019 Individual Aktivo Score® Challenge Take control of your lifestyle! Your Aktivo Score® indicates significant health risk. Strike the right balance with your physical\nactivities by getting enough sleep and exercise,\nand remaining active throughout the day Yesterday\'s impact on your Aktivo Score®
See how well you can balance your daily physical activity.\nGet enough sleep, exercise regularly and avoid sitting too long.\nCheck where your average daily Aktivo Score® stands in Aktivo Complete.
YOUR LATEST MyBenefits360 unable to fetch your daily score. Please try again. AKTIVO SCORE® Stay healthy with the Aktivo Score® as your daily guide. To score 80+ for good health, exercise for at least 30 minutes a day, sit less than 8 hours a day, and sleep between 7 and 9 hours a day. Sleeping between 7 and 9 hours is important for your health and can have beneficial effects on your heart, metabolism and cognitive function. The normal resting heart rate for adults is between 60 and 100 beats per minute. A lower heart rate at rest usually indicates a more efficient heart function and better cardiorespiratory fitness. Taking more steps with walking increases your physical activity, reduces your sedentary behavior and improves your health and Aktivo Score
You slept for {0} hours {1} minutes last night. Adequate sleep is essential for a healthy lifestyle. Tap here to check your weekly average. A good nights sleep will improve your Aktivo Score®
Exercise is any activity that requires physical efforts such as a swim, jog, gym workout or bike ride. Exercise will improve your health and Aktivo Score® Sedentary behavior means sitting or lying down when awake and in which little to no physical effort is made. A sedentary time of 8 hours or more can be detrimental and will bring down your Aktivo Score® Light activity is any activity such as walking or moving around with household chores that requires some but not intense physical effort. Replacing sedentary time with light activity will improve your health and Aktivo Score®
First Name: Last Name: Gender: Phone Number: Date of Birth: Height: Weight: Bed Time: Wake-Up Time: Utilities
▲ ▼ MB360 keeps your profile information private \nBy consenting to share this information, you understand that your anonymised data may or may not be included in statistics which may or may not be shared with your employer and/ or your insurance provider. For full information, see the Privacy Policy.\n\nYour biological sex, date of birth, bedtime and wake-up time is used to generate your Aktivo Score®. Your anonymised data may be used for statistical purposes.\n\nYour name and phone number are used to verify your identity in the event that you are locked out from your account. We will not call you or send you unsolicited texts. Badges are awarded every day upon successfully acheiving at least one daily goal. Depending on the number of goals you have achieved yesterday.
